newsitem.title: USA: CME July lumber futures surge limit on buy stops.
newsitem.headline: CME July lumber futures surge limit on buy stops.

text.p: July CME lumber futures ran up the $10.00 per thousand board foot daily limit on technical buy stops and other months followed with limitless May also up sharply, traders said.
July ran up the limit to $394.50 per tbf while May was up $9.10 at $391.80. Other months were up $4.70 to $4.80 per tbf.

Early support was linked to reports of increased cash lumber trade volume, which boosted futures into buy stops, floor sources said. Local short covering also accounted for much of the price climb, they said.
